Title: Geek Charming
Writer: Robin Palmer (based on the novel by), Elizabeth Hackett (teleplay), Hilary Galanoy (teleplay)
Actors: Sarah Hyland, Matt Prokop, Sasha Pieterse, Jordan Nichols
Plot: To win a school popularity contest, a high school diva permits a film club classmate to record her popular life, but the film starts documenting her decline instead.
